name: Newton's Second Law
description: Force is mass times acceleration.

name: Kinetic Energy
description: Kinetic energy of an object in motion.

name: Potential Energy
description: Gravitational potential energy.

name: Work Done
description: Work done by a force over a distance.

name: Power
description: Rate of doing work or energy transfer.

name: Momentum
description: Momentum of a moving object.

name: Impulse
description: Change in momentum.

name: Ohm's Law
description: Voltage is current times resistance.

name: Coulomb's Law
description: Force between two charges.

name: Wave Speed
description: Speed of a wave is frequency times wavelength.

name: Frequency
description: Number of oscillations per second.

name: Density
description: Mass per unit volume.

name: Pressure
description: Force per unit area.

name: Boyle's Law
description: Pressure and volume relationship in gases.

name: Charles's Law
description: Volume and temperature relationship in gases.

name: Ideal Gas Law
description: Equation of state for an ideal gas.

name: Refractive Index
description: Speed of light in a medium.

name: Snell's Law
description: Light refraction at boundaries.

name: Mirror Equation
description: Relates focal length and object distance.

name: Lens Formula
description: Similar to the mirror equation.

name: Hooke's Law
description: Force exerted by a spring.

name: Gravitational Force
description: Force between two masses.

name: Centripetal Force
description: Force keeping an object in circular motion.

name: Thermal Energy
description: Heat energy transfer.

name: Efficiency
formula: η = (Useful energy output / Total energy input) * 100%
description: Efficiency of a process.

name: Mechanical Advantage
description: Mechanical advantage of a machine.

name: Specific Heat Capacity
description: Heat capacity per unit mass.

name: Latent Heat
description: Heat for phase change per unit mass.

name: Capacitance
description: Charge stored per unit voltage.

name: Magnetic Force
description: Force on a charge in a magnetic field.

name: Magnetic Flux
description: Magnetic field passing through an area.

name: Faraday's Law
description: Induced EMF due to changing magnetic flux.

name: Lenz's Law
description: Direction of induced EMF opposes change in flux.

name: Lorentz Force
description: Force on a charge due to electric and magnetic fields.

name: Thermal Conductivity
description: Heat transfer through a material.

name: Electric Field
description: Electric field due to a charge.

name: Electric Potential
description: Potential energy per unit charge.

name: Coulomb's Constant
description: Proportionality constant in Coulomb's law.

name: Permittivity of Free Space
description: Electric constant in vacuum.

name: Permeability of Free Space
description: Magnetic constant in vacuum.

name: Planck's Constant
description: Constant in quantum mechanics.

name: Photoelectric Effect
description: Energy of a photon.

name: Einstein's Mass-Energy Equivalence
description: Energy-mass equivalence principle.

name: De Broglie Wavelength
description: Wavelength associated with a particle.

name: Heisenberg Uncertainty Principle
description: Limits precision of position and momentum.

name: Schrodinger Equation
description: Describes quantum state of a system.

name: Bohr's Radius
description: Radius of the first orbit in Bohr model.

name: Rydberg Formula
description: Wavelengths of spectral lines.

name: Stefan-Boltzmann Law
description: Power radiated by a black body.

name: Wien's Displacement Law
description: Peak wavelength of black body radiation.

name: Hubble's Law
description: Recessional velocity of galaxies.

name: Cosmological Redshift
description: Redshift due to expansion of the universe.

name: Escape Velocity
description: Minimum velocity to escape gravitational pull.

name: Orbital Speed
description: Speed of an object in orbit.

name: Kepler's Third Law
description: Square of orbital period proportional to cube of semi-major axis.

name: Harmonic Oscillator
description: Displacement of a simple harmonic oscillator.

name: Doppler Effect
description: Change in frequency due to motion.

name: Mach Number
description: Ratio of object's speed to speed of sound.

name: Reynolds Number
description: Dimensionless number describing fluid flow.

name: Bernoulli's Equation
formula: P + 0.5 * ρ * v² + ρ * g * h = constant
description: Conservation of energy in fluid flow.

name: Pascal's Principle
description: Pressure applied to a confined fluid is transmitted equally.

name: Archimedes' Principle
description: Buoyant force on an object submerged in fluid.

name: Young's Modulus
description: Measure of stiffness of a material.

name: Shear Modulus
description: Measure of material's response to shear stress.

name: Bulk Modulus
description: Measure of material's resistance to uniform compression.

name: Poisson's Ratio
description: Ratio of transverse strain to axial strain.

name: Moment of Inertia
description: Measure of an object's resistance to rotational motion.

name: Angular Momentum
description: Rotational analog of linear momentum.

name: Torque
description: Rotational analog of force.

name: Angular Acceleration
description: Rate of change of angular velocity.

name: Rotational Kinetic Energy
description: Kinetic energy due to rotational motion.

name: Centrifugal Force
description: Apparent force acting outward on a body moving around a center.

name: Coriolis Force
description: Apparent force caused by the rotation of the Earth.

name: Linear Charge Density
description: Charge per unit length.

name: Surface Charge Density
description: Charge per unit area.

name: Volume Charge Density
description: Charge per unit volume.

name: Electric Dipole Moment
description: Product of charge and separation distance.

name: Electric Flux
description: Electric field passing through a given area.

name: Magnetic Moment
description: Product of current and area of a loop.

name: Magnetic Flux Density
description: Magnetic field passing through a unit area.

name: Inductance
description: Ratio of magnetic flux to current.

name: Mutual Inductance
description: Inductance between two coils.

name: Self Inductance
description: Inductance of a single coil.

name: RC Time Constant
description: Time constant for an RC circuit.

name: RL Time Constant
description: Time constant for an RL circuit.

name: LC Circuit Resonance
description: Resonant frequency of an LC circuit.

name: RLC Circuit Damping
description: Damping factor of an RLC circuit.

name: AC Voltage
description: Alternating current voltage.

name: AC Current
description: Alternating current.

name: RMS Voltage
description: Root mean square of voltage.

name: RMS Current
description: Root mean square of current.

name: Power Factor
description: Ratio of real power to apparent power.

name: Real Power
description: Actual power consumed in an AC circuit.

name: Apparent Power
description: Product of RMS voltage and current.

name: Reactive Power
description: Power stored and released by inductors and capacitors.

name: Impedance
description: Total opposition to AC current.

name: Reactance
description: Inductive and capacitive opposition to AC current.

name: Admittance
description: Reciprocal of impedance.

name: Conductance
description: Reciprocal of resistance.

name: Susceptance
description: Reciprocal of reactance.

name: Phase Angle
description: Angle between voltage and current in an AC circuit.

name: Energy Stored in Inductor
description: Energy stored in a magnetic field of an inductor.

name: Energy Stored in Capacitor
description: Energy stored in an electric field of a capacitor.

name: Maxwell's First Equation
description: Gauss's law for electricity.

name: Maxwell's Second Equation
description: Gauss's law for magnetism.

name: Maxwell's Third Equation
description: Faraday's law of induction.

name: Maxwell's Fourth Equation
description: Ampere's law with Maxwell's correction.

name: Poynting Vector
description: Power per unit area carried by an electromagnetic wave.

name: Radiation Pressure
description: Pressure exerted by electromagnetic radiation.
